remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RectangleStylusShape> to perform hit testing on a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>. This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> called `presenter`.
